# msc-content



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                                                                                                                                         | Type      | Default        |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | -------------- |
| `alignX`        | `align-x`        | Overwrites the placement of content (NOT items!) on the horizontal axis See flexbox values May swap with horizontal alignment for correct behaviour | `string`  | `'stretch'`    |
| `alignY`        | `align-y`        | Overwrite placement of content (NOT items!) on the vertical axis See flexbox values May swap with horizontal alignment for correct behaviour        | `string`  | `'flex-start'` |
| `center`        | `center`         | Centers the content of this container (NOT items!) on both axis.                                                                                    | `boolean` | `undefined`    |
| `contentScroll` | `content-scroll` | Enables purposefully scrolling for the content of this tag.                                                                                         | `boolean` | `undefined`    |
| `trackX`        | `track-x`        | Changes the placement direction of this container. See flexbox specs. Applies "weird behaviour" fixes of flexbox.                                   | `boolean` | `undefined`    |
| `trackY`        | `track-y`        | Changes the placement direction of this container. See flexbox specs. Applies "weird behaviour" fixes of flexbox.                                   | `boolean` | `undefined`    |
